description: This file defines a Zustand store hook 'useFinanceStore' that manages global state and asynchronous actions for financial data, including summaries, transactions, budgets, goals, alerts, and seed data helpers.

methods.name: fetchSummary
methods.description: Fetches analytics summary data asynchronously and updates the store.

methods.name: fetchBehaviors
methods.description: Fetches analytics behaviors data asynchronously and updates the store.

methods.name: fetchOverspendingAlerts
methods.description: Retrieves overspending alerts for a given month asynchronously.

methods.name: fetchSavingsAdvice
methods.description: Fetches savings advice data for a specified period.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches list of transactions based on parameters.

methods.name: getTransactionById
methods.description: Returns a specific transaction by its ID from local state.

methods.name: createTx
methods.description: Creates a new transaction and updates local state.

methods.name: updateTx
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction and refreshes local state.

methods.name: deleteTx
methods.description: Deletes a transaction and refreshes local state.

methods.name: upsertBudget
methods.description: Creates or updates a budget entry.

methods.name: fetchBudgetSummary
methods.description: Retrieves budget summary for a specified month.

methods.name: seedDemoLoad
methods.description: Loads demo data with parameters for months back, total amount, and seed.

methods.name: seedDemoClear
methods.description: Clears demo data from the store and backend.
